testcase.classname: Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.name: user can add more than product to cart
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to Login page...........................................passed When user fill login data...................................................passed Then successfully login message displayed...................................passed Given user navigate to product page.........................................passed When user click on add to cart button.......................................passed Then product added message displayed........................................passed And shopping cart is increased..............................................passed

testcase.name: user can select categories and sub categories if found
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to homee page...........................................passed When user select category and subcategory...................................passed And user click on subcategory...............................................passed Then user find relative product page........................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.name: user complete his order
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to Login page...........................................passed When user fill login data...................................................passed Then successfully login message displayed...................................passed And shopping cart is increased..............................................passed Given user navigate to shopping cart page...................................passed When user do checkout.......................................................passed And user fill all mandatory data............................................passed Then Click Confirm order....................................................passed And Successfully order message is visible...................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could filter with color
testcase.name: user can filter products with product like shoes
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to shoes page...........................................passed When user Select color like red.............................................passed Then all shoes with red is displayed........................................passed

testcase.name: user fill data to register to website
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to register page........................................passed When user fill data.........................................................passed And user press register button..............................................passed Then successfully message displayed.........................................passed

testcase.name: User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to reset page...........................................passed When user enter email.......................................................passed Then successfully recovery message displayed................................passed
